sentences.sContent: There’s plenty to discover as you ramble around this little island.
sentences.sCn: 漫步这个小岛，你会有很多新发现。

sentences.sContent: He had lost track of what he was saying and began to ramble.
sentences.sCn: 他忘了自己的话题,便开始瞎扯起来。

synos.tran: 漫步；漫游；闲逛；漫谈；蔓延

words.tran: 漫步者，漫谈者；攀缘蔷薇

trans.tranOther: to go on a walk in the countryside for pleasure
